post.body: dunno about u but I'm afraid of having 2 accept 4ever + getting disappointed. Forceful obstacles, don't u think?
mayb that's the simple answer? What else is there REALLY? Often hard 2 hear what inner self says n we're human after all..
njaa, don't quite follow? I've never been afraid of change, on the contrary. Very busy life!!! Felt compelled.
truth is,I think conscious manifestation is a phase. After subconscious manif.Then comes the acceptance n listening inwards
EXACTLY!!! No wonder one's feel schizo (though I'm by no means that).It's like "what more can I do???Where r answers,??"
thanx SO much again, YOU r way more amazing than I could've imagined, cause some get so stuck on only keeping smile on... ;-) hugs!
I think we also need 2 remember that sometimes what seems a long wait is not really, from a bigger perspective.So...I wait.
crap n wish 4 more abundance. Howev am lucky that I usually feel strong incentive when I'm supposed 2 act 4 higher reason.
it's much more imp than manifesting cause that is not the purpose of my incarnation. Howev, I am tired of accepting so much
I think I can c where ur coming from. I've ruminated a lot about what 2 accept and "found" (?) that it's A LOT. In MY life,
also Coca Cola is EXTREMELY unhealthy and should be banned as a drug!!!! Can't believe pple want 2 drink such shit. (sorry...)
thanx! Yes, most ppl seem 2 assume others r from the same country, it's funny ;-)
WHAT??? Anti-gay???? I KNEW Obama did not only have clean powders in his bag. Just knew it. Guess I pick up on these things.
where one is standing = uncertainty. As 4 Sweden, mayb they'll come around, they r still pretty democratic comp. 2 most others.
concern. What do u mean by borders? Dunno, 2 me internet is so intangible it makes a lot of pple abusive and it's hard 2 know
really depressing thing is, they are affiliated with the company that wants to make cards n giftwrap out of my art!!! So thus my
thanks for ur comment! I was so shocked 2 c that a band I really like, The Real Tuesday Weld, sold I Love the Rain to Coke. The
other pple do also disappoint u, they may not be able to follow the direction where u should go 2gether. No?
u feel confused cause your inner or higher self tells u what u need but u misinterpret... don't know where to look. And..
don't forget about the qi cong movements for sleep when you have time ;-) thanks!
I don't think human kind will change that fast... it will take some more be4 altruism n empathy r common values.
all around hurts almost physically, it stands out more than ever: maybe truly time 4 change. Dark b4 dawn.Thanx 4 the thought!
That's so good 2 hear u know, right now I feel that authenticity doesn't pay off in the least. But makes sense that egotrippin
I don't know what kicks people get out of having as many ppl as possible visit their ramblings, come on! guess that's life :-0
you know, I've been thinking EXACTLY the same today as I hung out on Blogcatalog. The conceitedness!! Insincere exchanges :-(
yes, trying 2 think of strategies 4 a more peaceful and lighter year 2 come... Hope u find good plots ;-)
hi, I speak English and French, though they are not my native languages... what are you looking for? :-)
cool to see you here!!!
hm, your link doesn't work? Will try again later...
half birthday? Me too if I think you mean what you mean ;-)
Hi there, thanx 4 follow, how did u stumble upon my profile ? ;-) Have a cosy holiday!
A TIP: if u feel nervous at night: hold right hand over lower abdomen n left over solarplexus, n breathe slow n focused. Helps a bit.
It's just that I'm here mostly to socialize a bit, not to only announce all of my activities to the world ;-)
I'm sorry to say this but if there is never any interaction between me n som1 else I will delete them,am not much of a people hoarder.Sorry!
I was so hoping the radio show would generate greater understanding n mayb someth good 4 me 2, but I wonder... :-/
My radio documentary ab my social situation this morning was ok, "nice",but not as poignant as it could be.Ppl don't understand the reality.
They say the energies r really tricky right now, any1 have any comments/experiences? But "new beginnings" in '09... let's hope!
Got a spiky yoga mat (nail carpet?), surprisingly from my dad. Does anyone have experience with one, does it seem to work 4 u? Hurts like h*
Ok, finally over, wasn't that much ado but enough... gets more n more melancholic with each year, 2 many memories etc... now just empty.
A COSY STRESSFREE HOLIDAY FOR EVERYONE, MAKE IT A PLACE FOR WARMTH AND LOVE IF YOU CAN! HERE IN FINLAND IT'S STARTING NOW ;-) LOVE V-M
